players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.

Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Alice was killed by them. We only have Bob left as a villager. Vote Charlie out to win."

Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
